title: @RIOT, Thank You.  By the Gods above, Omega Skin Teemo is just pure...AWESOMENESS
body:
http://3.bp.blogspot.com/-jR6czUIn5jU/VRMD9aqSC8I/AAAAAAAAmvw/e-UNnYtJApE/s1600/teemo%2Bfront.jpg

**LOOK AT HIM.  JUST GAZE IN AWE.**

You want Teemo?  Here he is.

Mostly, the reason I was afraid for Teemo was that the retcon would change him into a furry, harmless Little Yordle Scout who would fight for his friends.  No, this skin pays homage towards the intense, killing spirit that Teemo has; and, the addition of this "Omega Squad" skin is going to open up a fresh, new perspective on alternate universes in the League of Legends.  It's heavily implied that this version of Teemo could be someone from a post-Apocalyptic universe where Runeterra is ravaged by years of war and conflict.  And, in the center of it all, is this one little Yordle that stands in the midst of the chaos, fighting his final battle.

>*War...War never changes...*

replies.body:
I always liked Teemo's two-sided nature, a character who rides the fine line between "chipper compatriot and unrepentant killer".

"There is something that switches off in Teemo, so that the lives he ends do not burden him." o_o

It's intriguing to see what he could become, should he fully tilt passed the point of no return.
I agree he finally just stayed in the switched killer mode....I think Teemo needs a tattoo to add to how gruff he seems now, like of the helmet Icon for the teaser.
Cindem, tell the Skins Team that they're doing a good job with all of these visuals!  Plus, this skin really puts the "Satanic side" into Teemo.
Even with a menacing new skin, he somehow still manages to look happier than a 4 year old with a happy meal.
"I've actually grown quite the beard under here"- ~~Moobeat~~ Teemo, 3/25/2015
THE TEASE I CAN'T CLAM DOWN FROM THE TEASE. MY FINGERS ARE GETTING TIRED FROM HOLDING THE SHIFT KEY TOO LONG.
Is this what happened in Kalamanga because the Institute doesnt exist anymore so Bandle city had to try and fix it and they suffered the consequences
It shouldn't have been a skin though. It should have been a rework or a new champion.
Skins, reworks, and new champions do not take up the same resources. All of them are in production simultaneously.
